CounterInfo.HumanName: Fragment front-end read beats from L2 cache
CounterInfo.ShortDescription: The number of read beats received by the fixed-function fragment front-end.
CounterInfo.LongDescription: This counter increments for every read beat received by the fixed-function fragment front-end.

CounterInfo.HumanName: Fragment front-end read bytes from L2 cache
CounterInfo.ShortDescription: The total number of bytes read from the L2 memory system by the shader core fragment front-end.
CounterInfo.LongDescription: This expression defines the total number of bytes read from the L2 memory system by the fragment front-end.

CounterInfo.HumanName: Fragment front-end read beats from external memory
CounterInfo.ShortDescription: The number of read beats received by the fixed-function fragment front-end that required an external memory access because of an L2 cache miss.
CounterInfo.LongDescription: This counter increments for every read beat received by the fixed-function fragment front-end that required an external memory access because of an L2 cache miss.

CounterInfo.HumanName: Fragment front-end read bytes from external memory
CounterInfo.ShortDescription: The total number of bytes read from the external memory system by the shader core fragment front-end.
CounterInfo.LongDescription: This expression defines the total number of bytes read from the external memory system by the fragment front-end.

CounterInfo.HumanName: Load/store unit read beats from L2 cache
CounterInfo.ShortDescription: The number of read beats received by the load/store unit.
CounterInfo.LongDescription: This counter increments for every read beat received by the load/store unit.

CounterInfo.HumanName: Load/store unit read bytes from L2 cache
CounterInfo.ShortDescription: The total number of bytes read from the L2 memory system by the load/store unit.
CounterInfo.LongDescription: This expression defines the total number of bytes read from the L2 memory system by the load/store unit.

CounterInfo.HumanName: Load/store unit bytes read from L2 per access cycle
CounterInfo.ShortDescription: The average number of bytes read from the L2 memory system by the load/store unit per read cycle.
CounterInfo.LongDescription:
This expression defines the average number of bytes read from the L2 memory system by the load/store unit per read cycle. This metric gives some idea how effectively data is being cached in the L1 load/store cache.
If more bytes are being requested per access than you would expect for the data layout you are using, review your data layout and access patterns.

CounterInfo.HumanName: Load/store unit read beats from external memory
CounterInfo.ShortDescription: The number of read beats received by the load/store unit that required an external memory access because of an L2 cache miss.
CounterInfo.LongDescription: This counter increments for every read beat received by the load/store unit that required an external memory access because of an L2 cache miss.

CounterInfo.HumanName: Load/store unit read bytes from external memory
CounterInfo.ShortDescription: The total number of bytes read from the external memory system by the load/store unit.
CounterInfo.LongDescription: This expression defines the total number of bytes read from the external memory system by the load/store unit.

CounterInfo.HumanName: Load/store unit bytes read from external memory per access cycle
CounterInfo.ShortDescription: The average number of bytes read from the external memory system by the load/store unit per read cycle.
CounterInfo.LongDescription:
This expression defines the average number of bytes read from the external memory system by the load/store unit per read cycle. This metric indicates how effectively data is being cached in the L2 cache.
If more bytes are being requested per access than you would expect for the data layout you are using, review your data layout and access patterns.

CounterInfo.HumanName: Texture unit read beats from L2 cache
CounterInfo.ShortDescription: The number of read beats received by the texture unit.
CounterInfo.LongDescription: This counter increments for every read beat received by the texture unit.

CounterInfo.HumanName: Texture unit read bytes from L2 cache
CounterInfo.ShortDescription: The total number of bytes read from the L2 memory system by the texture unit.
CounterInfo.LongDescription: This expression defines the total number of bytes read from the L2 memory system by the texture unit.

CounterInfo.HumanName: Texture unit bytes read from L2 per texture cycle
CounterInfo.ShortDescription: The average number of bytes read from the L2 memory system by the texture unit per filtering cycle.
CounterInfo.LongDescription:
This expression defines the average number of bytes read from the L2 memory system by the texture unit per filtering cycle. This metric indicates how effectively textures are being cached in the L1 texture cache.
If more bytes are being requested per access than you would expect for the format you are using, review your texture settings. Arm recommends:
* Using mipmaps for offline generated textures. * Using ASTC or ETC compression for offline generated textures. * Replacing runtime framebuffer formats with narrower formats. * Reducing use of imageLoad/Store to allow framebuffer compression. * Reducing use of negative LOD bias used for texture sharpening. * Reducing use of anisotropic filtering, or reducing the level of MAX_ANISOTROPY used.

CounterInfo.HumanName: Texture unit read beats from external memory
CounterInfo.ShortDescription: The number of read beats received by the texture unit that required an external memory access because of an L2 cache miss.
CounterInfo.LongDescription: This counter increments for every read beat received by the texture unit that required an external memory access because of an L2 cache miss.

CounterInfo.HumanName: Texture unit read bytes from external memory
CounterInfo.ShortDescription: The total number of bytes read from the external memory system by the texture unit.
CounterInfo.LongDescription: This expression defines the total number of bytes read from the external memory system by the texture unit.

CounterInfo.HumanName: Texture unit bytes read from external memory per texture cycle
CounterInfo.ShortDescription: The average number of bytes read from the external memory system by the texture unit per filtering cycle.
CounterInfo.LongDescription:
This expression defines the average number of bytes read from the external memory system by the texture unit per filtering cycle. This metric indicates how effectively textures are being cached in the L2 cache.
If more bytes are being requested per access than you would expect for the format you are using, review your texture settings. Arm recommends:
* Using mipmaps for offline generated textures. * Using ASTC or ETC compression for offline generated textures. * Replacing runtime framebuffer formats with narrower formats. * Reducing use of imageLoad/Store to allow framebuffer compression. * Reducing use of negative LOD bias used for texture sharpening. * Reducing use of anisotropic filtering, or reducing the level of MAX_ANISOTROPY used.

CounterInfo.HumanName: Miscellaneous read beats from L2 cache
CounterInfo.ShortDescription: The number of read beats received by a unit that is not specifically identified.
CounterInfo.LongDescription: This counter increments for every read beat received by any unit that is not identified as a specific data destination.

CounterInfo.HumanName: Load/store unit write beats to L2 memory system
CounterInfo.ShortDescription: The number of write beats sent by the load/store unit.
CounterInfo.LongDescription: This counter increments for every write beat sent by the load/store unit.

CounterInfo.HumanName: Load/store unit write beats to L2 memory system
CounterInfo.ShortDescription: The number of write beats sent by the load/store unit.
CounterInfo.LongDescription: This counter increments for every write beat sent by the load/store unit.

CounterInfo.HumanName: Load/store unit write-back write beats to L2 memory system
CounterInfo.ShortDescription: The number of write beats by the load/store unit that are because of write-back.
CounterInfo.LongDescription: This counter increments for every write beat by the load/store unit that are because of write-back.

CounterInfo.HumanName: Load/store unit other write beats to L2 memory system
CounterInfo.ShortDescription: The number of write beats by the load/store unit that are because of any reason other than write-back.
CounterInfo.LongDescription: This counter increments for every write beat by the load/store unit that are because of any reason other than write-back.

CounterInfo.HumanName: Load/store unit write bytes to L2 memory system
CounterInfo.ShortDescription: The total number of bytes written to the L2 memory system by the load/store unit.
CounterInfo.LongDescription: This expression defines the total number of bytes written to the L2 memory system by the load/store unit.

CounterInfo.HumanName: Load/store unit bytes written to L2 per access cycle
CounterInfo.ShortDescription: The average number of bytes written to the L2 memory system by the load/store unit per write cycle.
CounterInfo.LongDescription:
This expression defines the average number of bytes written to the L2 memory system by the load/store unit per write cycle.
If more bytes are being written per access than you would expect for the data layout you are using, review your data layout and access patterns to improve cache locality.

CounterInfo.HumanName: Ray tracing unit read beats from L2 cache
CounterInfo.ShortDescription: The number of read beats received by the ray tracing unit.
CounterInfo.LongDescription: This counter increments for every read beat received by the ray tracing unit.

CounterInfo.HumanName: Ray tracing unit read bytes from L2 cache
CounterInfo.ShortDescription: The total number of bytes read from the L2 memory system by the ray tracing unit.
CounterInfo.LongDescription: This expression defines the total number of bytes read from the L2 memory system by the ray tracing unit.

CounterInfo.HumanName: Ray tracing unit read beats from external memory
CounterInfo.ShortDescription: The number of read beats received by the ray tracing unit that required an external memory access because of an L2 cache miss.
CounterInfo.LongDescription: This counter increments for every read beat received by the ray tracing unit that required an external memory access because of an L2 cache miss.

CounterInfo.HumanName: Ray tracing unit read bytes from external memory
CounterInfo.ShortDescription: The total number of bytes read from the external memory system by the ray tracing unit.
CounterInfo.LongDescription: This expression defines the total number of bytes read from the external memory system by the ray tracing unit.

CounterInfo.HumanName: Tile unit write beats to L2 memory system
CounterInfo.ShortDescription: The number of write beats sent by the tile write-back unit.
CounterInfo.LongDescription: This counter increments for every write beat sent by the tile write-back unit.

CounterInfo.HumanName: Tile unit write bytes to L2 memory system
CounterInfo.ShortDescription: The total number of bytes written to the L2 memory system by the tile write-back unit.
CounterInfo.LongDescription: This expression defines the total number of bytes written to the L2 memory system by the tile write-back unit.

CounterInfo.HumanName: Tile unit bytes written to L2 per pixel
CounterInfo.ShortDescription: The average number of bytes written to the L2 memory system by the tile unit per output pixel.
CounterInfo.LongDescription:
This expression defines the average number of bytes written to the L2 memory system by the tile unit per output pixel.
If more bytes are being written per pixel than expected, Arm recommends:
* Using narrower attachment color formats with fewer bytes per pixel. * Configuring attachments so that they can use framebuffer compression. * Invalidating transient attachments to skip writing to memory. * Using inline multi-sample resolve to skip writing the multi-sampled data to memory.

CounterInfo.HumanName: Miscellaneous write beats to L2 memory system
CounterInfo.ShortDescription: The number of write beats sent by any unit that is not specifically identified.
CounterInfo.LongDescription: This counter increments for every write beat sent by any unit that is not identified as a specific data source.

CounterInfo.HumanName: Other unit write bytes to L2 memory system
CounterInfo.ShortDescription: The number of write bytes sent by any unit that is not specifically identified.
CounterInfo.LongDescription: This expression defines the number of write beats sent by any unit that is not identified as a specific data source.
